name: B3ezorians
description:
There are 2 modes in this game:

Survival: try to survive for limited time to win.

Destroy: try to destroy all enemy portals/gates to win.

Just build, Click on buildings to command beezorian and click on grid to make them go to it but they have limited time to stay away from their base.

Hope i didn't forget anything but you can try and have fun :)

Controls:

WASD, Arrows or Mouse Left Click for navigation

Q,E or midle mouse to rotate

Numbad (-, +) or Scroll wheel to zoom

G to Get Ride Of Grids Light

B to Build Extended base (You can Build only every 10 sec ).
